contents.title: Dec.2020 track X-MARKER
contents.description: Using EXT-X-MARKER directive in HTTP Live Streaming to extract AdMetadata URL. Adapter will periodically makes request to AdMetadata URL and read AdMetadata. Given segSequenceNum will be compared to those in the stream. When matched, adapter will call event callback functions and App is responsible to make RAF.fireTrackingEvents().
